alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Dickens; Floyd; Motley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 12:21AM CDT until September 16 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dickens County in northwestern Texas... Eastern Floyd County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Crosby County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Motley County in northwestern Texas... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southeast of South Plains, or 10 miles northeast of Floydada, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Matador, Dougherty, South Plains, and Roaring Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
